title: 08/07 Football: Cutler The Right Move For Miami?
description:
The gang is back together on a Football Monday edition of Pick Six Podcast, and JLC, Pete, Will and Nick open by breaking down Jay Cutler signing with the Dolphins (:10) Did the Dolphins really consider Tebow (2:30)? The guys debate whether the Dolphins are better off with Cutler (13:30) and if Cutler over Kaepernick was the right move (16:15). We cover breaking news that Anquan Boldin signs with the Bills (19:30) and get excited about Brock Osweiler starting for the Browns in their first preseason game (23:00)! JLC gives his impressions of DeShone Kizer (25:45) and Pete expresses concerns about the Broncos QB battle (30:30), and reveals with Denver passer impressed him most -- and it's not who you think (32:45). The gang closes on a light note, as they take bets on who could drink more in one sitting - JLC or Pete (37:20).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
